name: Roboxing
description:
Roboxing is a boxing match that occurs between semi-sentient robots. Hook, jab, dodge, and block your way to victory! You and a friend will duke it out in the ring to find out who's the better roboxer!

This game was originally developed for an arcade cabinet at Michigan Technological University, and it has been adapted for release.

This game is Windows only and requires two XInput (XBox) enabled controllers. You can use the following tool to adapt USB controllers into XInput enabled devices.
https://github.com/x360ce/x360ce#readme

Developed by Tyler Eichten
Sound by Logan Hardin

You can view and download the source code here:
https://github.com/tleichte/Roboxing
